IIT Gandhinagar Recruitment 2025 - Apply Online for Junior Research Fellow Post
Prasanna / All Government Jobs / Aug 23, 2025, 15:33 IST
 Indian Institute of Technology, Gandhinagar
 1 Jobs |  Posted On : 23-Aug-2025 |  Gujarat |  Salary : 37,000 to 37,000




FOLLOW

The Indian Institute of Technology Gandhinagar (IIT Gandhinagar) has announced the latest job notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for Junior Research Fellow Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the B.E/ B.Tech., M.E/ M.Tech in Mechanical Engineering can grab this chance and apply for the IIT Gandhinagar Recruitment 2025. Here we include the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for these posts. Interested and eligible aspirants can apply online through the website on or before the last date of application.




If you are looking for more, here is a list of Government Jobs in 2025 that you can all apply for. Use this link for more jobs in Gujarat.

IIT Gandhinagar Recruitment 2025 - Eligibility Criteria
Name of the Posts	No. of Vacancies	Qualification
Junior Research Fellow 	01	B.E/ B.Tech, M.E/ M.Tech in Mechanical Engineering

Age Limit for the IIT Gandhinagar Recruitment 2025

The Minimum Age Limit: 21 years.
The Maximum Age Limit: 35 years.

Selection Process for the IIT Gandhinagar Recruitment 2025

Interview

Salary Structure for the IIT Gandhinagar Recruitment 2025

The Minimum Salary: Rs. 27,000 /- per month.

Application fee for the IIT Gandhinagar Recruitment 2025

There is no application fee.
How to Apply for the IIT Gandhinagar Recruitment 2025
Visit the official website.
Go to the recruitment or carer page.
Check for the Junior Research Fellow Jobs 2025.
Read the notification carefully.
Check the eligibility criteria.
If you meet the eligibility criteria.
Download the application form.
Fill out the application form carefully.
Submit the application form and capture the application number for further reference.

Important Dates

Starting Date of Application	16-08-2025
Last Date of Application	27-08-2025

 

Application form	Click Here
Official Notification	Click Here
